description: Quantitative priors for membrane potential, gap junctions, ion channels, and bioelectric signaling in development and disease

priors.source: Yang & Brackett 2011; cancer cells consistently depolarized vs healthy
Levin 2014, mitochondrial membrane potential in healthy cells
Trachootham et al. 2009, elevated ROS in cancer
Trachootham et al. 2009, normal ROS homeostasis
Aasen et al. 2016, functional GJ communication in normal tissue
Aasen et al. 2016, reduced GJ communication in tumors
Hodgkin & Huxley 1952, standard neuronal resting potential
Maeda et al. 2009, Cx43 gap junction crystal structure
Levin 2012, depolarized cells tend toward proliferation
Levin 2012, hyperpolarized cells tend toward quiescence/differentiation
Sanderson et al. 1994, intercellular calcium wave propagation
Standard planaria head regeneration timeline, Reddien & Alvarado 2004
Adams et al. 2007, Xenopus tadpole tail regeneration
Levin 2014, bioelectric signaling range in morphogenesis
